quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
name: George Sand

quote: Life is full of happiness and tears; be strong and have faith.
name: Kareena Kapoor Khan

quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
name: Omar Khayyam

quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
name: Euripides

quote: Happiness radiates like the fragrance from a flower and draws all good things towards you.
name: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: The most worth-while thing is to try to put happiness into the lives of others.
name: Robert Baden-Powell

quote: Let us never know what old age is. Let us know the happiness time brings, not count the years.
name: Ausonius

quote: Happiness is like a kiss. You must share it to enjoy it.
name: Bernard Meltzer

quote: Every day is a new day, and you'll never be able to find happiness if you don't move on.
name: Carrie Underwood

quote: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
name: Richard Bach

quote: The secret to happiness is freedom... And the secret to freedom is courage.
name: Thucydides

quote: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
name: George Burns

quote: Family and friendships are two of the greatest facilitators of happiness.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: The most simple things can bring the most happiness.
name: Izabella Scorupco

quote: True happiness is... to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: Crying is cleansing. There's a reason for tears, happiness or sadness.
name: Dionne Warwick

quote: The Constitution only gives people the right to pursue happiness. You have to catch it yourself.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Happiness held is the seed; Happiness shared is the flower.
name: John Harrigan

quote: Bride: A woman with a fine prospect of happiness behind her.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Happiness is nothing more than good health and a bad memory.
name: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Joy is prayer; joy is strength: joy is love; joy is a net of love by which you can catch souls.
name: Mother Teresa

quote: The true secret of happiness lies in taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
name: William Morris

quote: Whoever said money can't buy happiness simply didn't know where to go shopping.
name: Gertrude Stein

quote: I get way too much happiness from good food.
name: Elizabeth Olsen

quote: All happiness depends on a leisurely breakfast.
name: John Gunther

quote: A smile is happiness you'll find right under your nose.
name: Tom Wilson

quote: The moments of happiness we enjoy take us by surprise. It is not that we seize them, but that they seize us.
name: Ashley Montagu

quote: I do believe that if you haven't learnt about sadness, you cannot appreciate happiness.
name: Nana Mouskouri

quote: Happiness can exist only in acceptance.
name: George Orwell

quote: All you need for happiness is a good gun, a good horse, and a good wife.
name: Daniel Boone

quote: Happiness is the natural flower of duty.
name: Phillips Brooks

quote: Poetry comes from the highest happiness or the deepest sorrow.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: The white man's happiness cannot be purchased by the black man's misery.
name: Frederick Douglass

quote: True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talents.
name: John W. Gardner

quote: There is no way to happiness - happiness is the way.
name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Happiness is not a matter of intensity but of balance, order, rhythm and harmony.
name: Thomas Merton

quote: Now and then it's good to pause in our pursuit of happiness and just be happy.
name: Guillaume Apollinaire

quote: You can't get a cup of tea big enough or a book long enough to suit me.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.
name: Democritus

quote: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
name: Aristotle

quote: True happiness comes from the joy of deeds well done, the zest of creating things new.
name: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin; what else does a man need to be happy?
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Why does watching a dog be a dog fill one with happiness?
name: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: I think if you're a good person and spread happiness, good things will come to you!
name: Jessie James Decker

quote: Marriage is the most natural state of man, and... the state in which you will find solid happiness.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: The objective of cleaning is not just to clean, but to feel happiness living within that environment.
name: Marie Kondo

quote: Money may not buy happiness, but it can damn well give it!
name: Freddie Mercury

quote: I enjoy being happy every day, and hopefully you can hear my happiness in my music. Life is beautiful.
name: Christina Milian

quote: Happiness and moral duty are inseparably connected.
name: George Washington

quote: Derive happiness in oneself from a good day's work, from illuminating the fog that surrounds us.
name: Henri Matisse

quote: The happiness of society is the end of government.
name: John Adams

quote: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.
name: Charles Spurgeon

quote: Some cause happiness wherever they go; others whenever they go.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: I love walking down the street and seeing faces and drama and happiness and sadness and dirt and cleanliness.
name: Ric Ocasek

quote: If you want to be happy, be.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: A contented mind is the greatest blessing a man can enjoy in this world.
name: Joseph Addison

quote: The two enemies of human happiness are pain and boredom.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Happiness in intelligent people is the rarest thing I know.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Happiness is not an ideal of reason, but of imagination.
name: Immanuel Kant

quote: More compassionate mind, more sense of concern for other's well-being, is source of happiness.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: Happiness: a good bank account, a good cook, and a good digestion.
name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Men can only be happy when they do not assume that the object of life is happiness.
name: George Orwell

quote: Being of service to others is what brings true happiness.
name: Marie Osmond

quote: The drive for happiness is vital; it's what keeps us in motion.
name: Richard Gere

quote: Happiness is like a cloud, if you stare at it long enough, it evaporates.
name: Sarah McLachlan

quote: To find out what one is fitted to do, and to secure an opportunity to do it, is the key to happiness.
name: John Dewey

quote: Some people think happiness is a luxury, but it's a necessity. You need to make space for it in your life.
name: Christie Brinkley

quote: No man chooses evil because it is evil; he only mistakes it for happiness, the good he seeks.
name: Mary Wollstonecraft

quote: It's part of life to have obstacles. It's about overcoming obstacles; that's the key to happiness.
name: Herbie Hancock

quote: Independence is happiness.
name: Susan B. Anthony

quote: Happiness is only real when shared.
name: Christopher McCandless

quote: God cannot give us a happiness and peace apart from Himself, because it is not there. There is no such thing.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: Happiness comes from... some curious adjustment to life.
name: Hugh Walpole

quote: One test of the correctness of educational procedure is the happiness of the child.
name: Maria Montessori

quote: Remember that the happiest people are not those getting more, but those giving more.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Happiness never lays its finger on its pulse.
name: Adam Smith

quote: Remember happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely on what you think.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: Being happy is of the utmost importance. Success in anything is through happiness.
name: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: My idea of absolute happiness is to be in bed on a rainy day, with my blankie, my cat, and my dog.
name: Anne Lamott

quote: A hug is like a boomerang - you get it back right away.
name: Bil Keane

quote: When unhappy, one doubts everything; when happy, one doubts nothing.
name: Joseph Roux

quote: Happiness is that state of consciousness which proceeds from the achievement of one's values.
name: Ayn Rand

quote: The crown of life is neither happiness nor annihilation; it is understanding.
name: Winifred Holtby

quote: It is neither wealth nor splendor; but tranquility and occupation which give you happiness.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Curiosity is one of the great secrets of happiness.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: For happiness one needs security, but joy can spring like a flower even from the cliffs of despair.
name: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Happiness... consists in giving, and in serving others.
name: Henry Drummond

quote: Power means happiness; power means hard work and sacrifice.
name: Beyonce Knowles

quote: Everyone has their own way of expressing happiness.
name: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: It is not in the pursuit of happiness that we find fulfillment, it is in the happiness of pursuit.
name: Denis Waitley

quote: Making money is a happiness. And that's a great incentive. Making other people happy is a super-happiness.
name: Muhammad Yunus

quote: There is no greater sorrow than to recall happiness in times of misery.
name: Dante Alighieri

quote: Happiness makes up in height for what it lacks in length.
name: Robert Frost

quote: Be more dedicated to making solid achievements than in running after swift but synthetic happiness.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: No one has a right to consume happiness without producing it.
name: Helen Keller

quote: The greatest happiness of the greatest number is the foundation of morals and legislation.
name: Jeremy Bentham

quote: Affection is responsible for nine-tenths of whatever solid and durable happiness there is in our lives.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: Happiness is hard to recall. Its just a glow.
name: Frank McCourt

quote: The happiness of the bee and the dolphin is to exist. For man it is to know that and to wonder at it.
name: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quote: The groundwork of all happiness is health.
name: Leigh Hunt

quote: It is one of my sources of happiness never to desire a knowledge of other people's business.
name: Dolley Madison

quote: Respect your partner. Be happy in your partner's happiness.
name: Divyanka Tripathi

quote: The folly of endless consumerism sends us on a wild goose-chase for happiness through materialism.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: Life in common among people who love each other is the ideal of happiness.
name: George Sand

quote: Happiness is not a goal; it is a by-product.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: True happiness... is not attained through self-gratification, but through fidelity to a worthy purpose.
name: Helen Keller

quote: Caring about others, running the risk of feeling, and leaving an impact on people, brings happiness.
name: Harold Kushner

quote: We find delight in the beauty and happiness of children that makes the heart too big for the body.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Happiness is a thing to be practiced, like the violin.
name: John Lubbock

quote: The greatest happiness is to know the source of unhappiness.
name: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: There is no cosmetic for beauty like happiness.
name: Maria Mitchell

quote: For me, the opposite of happiness isn't sadness but boredom.
name: Sushant Singh Rajput

quote: Happiness does not lie in happiness, but in the achievement of it.
name: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: The happiness of a man in this life does not consist in the absence but in the mastery of his passions.
name: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Just do what must be done. This may not be happiness, but it is greatness.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Good clothing is a passport to happiness.
name: Yves Saint Laurent

quote: I'm trying to find a little joy and happiness, a lot of giggles - and maybe some pretty shoes.
name: Tracee Ellis Ross

quote: I think a child may be the only thing that could give me true happiness.
name: Nicki Minaj

quote: The measure of success is happiness and peace of mind.
name: Bobby Davro

quote: If I can bring happiness to people all around the world, then I will try my best to do so.
name: Tom Holland

quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: The secret to happiness is to face the fact that the world is horrible.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: Happiness is good health and a bad memory.
name: Ingrid Bergman

quote: They must often change, who would be constant in happiness or wisdom.
name: Confucius

quote: Happiness is the harvest of a quiet eye.
name: Austin O'Malley

quote: If your happiness depends on what somebody else does, I guess you do have a problem.
name: Richard Bach

quote: What can be added to the happiness of a man who is in health, out of debt, and has a clear conscience?
name: Adam Smith

quote: A really great talent finds its happiness in execution.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Every gift from a friend is a wish for your happiness.
name: Richard Bach

quote: Happiness is nothing but good health and freedom, and money is the single best way you can buy your freedom.
name: Scott Adams

quote: Desire nothing, give up all desires and be happy.
name: Swami Sivananda

quote: True happiness consists not in the multitude of friends, but in the worth and choice.
name: Ben Jonson

quote: The only thing that holds true happiness is that moment when you're in it. Nothing can be controlled.
name: Eliza Doolittle

quote: I think the pursuit of happiness is the pursuit of reality because illusion never leaves us ultimately happy.
name: Parker Palmer

quote: Life finds its purpose and fulfillment in the expansion of happiness.
name: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: A large income is the best recipe for happiness I ever heard of.
name: Jane Austen

quote: I have learned to seek my happiness by limiting my desires, rather than in attempting to satisfy them.
name: John Stuart Mill

quote: The People have a right to the Truth as they have a right to life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness.
name: Frank Norris

quote: Happiness is inward, and not outward; and so, it does not depend on what we have, but on what we are.
name: Henry Van Dyke

quote: Knowledge of what is possible is the beginning of happiness.
name: George Santayana

quote: Happiness consists not in having much, but in being content with little.
name: Marguerite Gardiner

quote: The pursuit of happiness is in our Constitution. We're all entitled to have the best we can.
name: Loretta Swit

quote: Satisfaction of one's curiosity is one of the greatest sources of happiness in life.
name: Linus Pauling

quote: My happiness grows in direct proportion to my acceptance, and in inverse proportion to my expectations.
name: Michael J. Fox

quote: When ambition ends, happiness begins.
name: Thomas Merton

quote: Success is not just making money. Success is happiness. Success is fulfillment; it's the ability to give.
name: Adam Neumann

quote: The secret of happiness is to admire without desiring.
name: Carl Sandburg

quote: Success to me is only two things: happiness and stability.
name: Kehlani

quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is liking what you get.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: The only way to find true happiness is to risk being completely cut open.
name: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: But what is happiness except the simple harmony between a man and the life he leads?
name: Albert Camus

quote: Never mind your happiness; do your duty.
name: Peter Drucker

quote: Happiness must happen, and the same holds for success: you have to let it happen by not caring about it.
name: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: Happiness is beneficial for the body, but it is grief that develops the powers of the mind.
name: Marcel Proust

quote: Happiness is your own treasure because it lies within you.
name: Prem Rawat

quote: Our envy always lasts longer than the happiness of those we envy.
name: Heraclitus

quote: Happiness is an inside job.
name: William Arthur Ward

quote: It's enough to indulge and to be selfish but true happiness is really when you start giving back.
name: Adrian Grenier

quote: Indeed, man wishes to be happy even when he so lives as to make happiness impossible.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: To be without some of the things you want is an indispensable part of happiness.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: Be happy with what you have and are, be generous with both, and you won't have to hunt for happiness.
name: William E. Gladstone

quote: The person born with a talent they are meant to use will find their greatest happiness in using it.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Happiness is a wine of the rarest vintage, and seems insipid to a vulgar taste.
name: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: A man doesn't know what happiness is until he's married. By then, it's too late.
name: Frank Sinatra

quote: I am about to be married, and am of course in all the misery of a man in pursuit of happiness.
name: Lord Byron

quote: Happiness is your dentist telling you it won't hurt and then having him catch his hand in the drill.
name: Johnny Carson

quote: Understanding your employee's perspective can go a long way towards increasing productivity and happiness.
name: Kathryn Minshew

quote: My faith helps me understand that circumstances don't dictate my happiness, my inner peace.
name: Denzel Washington

quote: Happiness consists in activity. It is running steam, not a stagnant pool.
name: John Mason Good

quote: It is the ultimate luxury to combine passion and contribution. It's also a very clear path to happiness.
name: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: Happiness exists only if you have a lot of people to share it with.
name: Ranbir Kapoor

quote: God dislikes evil, and no happiness can be built on hate. Love one another as brothers.
name: Josephine Baker

quote: The only true happiness comes from squandering ourselves for a purpose.
name: John Mason Brown

quote: I hump the wild to take it all in, there is no bag limit on happiness.
name: Ted Nugent

quote: The art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Money can't buy you happiness, but it can buy you a yacht big enough to pull up right alongside it.
name: David Lee Roth

quote: My mantra is: Let there be happiness in my soul, and let me share it with the world.
name: Alexandra Stoddard

quote: The sound of laughter is like the vaulted dome of a temple of happiness.
name: Milan Kundera

quote: There is joy in work. There is no happiness except in the realization that we have accomplished something.
name: Henry Ford

quote: One of the first conditions of happiness is that the link between Man and Nature shall not be broken.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: True success, true happiness lies in freedom and fulfillment.
name: Dada Vaswani

quote: Heroism is accessible. Happiness is more difficult.
name: Albert Camus

quote: In times of joy, all of us wished we possessed a tail we could wag.
name: W. H. Auden

quote: What we call the secret of happiness is no more a secret than our willingness to choose life.
name: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Happiness can only be found if you can free yourself of all other distractions.
name: Saul Bellow

quote: My imagination can picture no fairer happiness than to continue living for art.
name: Clara Schumann

quote: Happiness isn't happiness unless there's a violin-playing goat.
name: Julia Roberts

quote: The first recipe for happiness is: avoid too lengthy meditation on the past.
name: Andre Maurois

quote: I adored Mickey Mouse when I was a child. He was the emblem of happiness and funniness.
name: Maurice Sendak

quote: Love is not a feeling of happiness. Love is a willingness to sacrifice.
name: Michael Novak

quote: Beauty is the promise of happiness.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: All who joy would win must share it. Happiness was born a Twin.
name: Lord Byron

quote: The happiest people seem to be those who have no particular cause for being happy except that they are so.
name: William Inge

quote: Real happiness is cheap enough, yet how dearly we pay for its counterfeit.
name: Hosea Ballou

quote: Low expectations is the key to happiness in life.
name: Christopher Miller

quote: Success is getting and achieving what you want. Happiness is wanting and being content with what you get.
name: Bernard Meltzer

quote: We never taste happiness in perfection, our most fortunate successes are mixed with sadness.
name: Pierre Corneille

quote: Lovers who love truly do not write down their happiness.
name: Anatole France

quote: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions and not our circumstances.
name: Martha Washington

quote: Future. That period of time in which our affairs prosper, our friends are true and our happiness is assured.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: I think happiness is love.
name: Vladimir Putin

quote: Happy is the man who has broken the chains which hurt the mind, and has given up worrying once and for all.
name: Ovid

quote: That is happiness; to be dissolved into something complete and great.
name: Willa Cather

quote: When we were together, I loved you deeply and you gave me so much happiness I can never repay you.
name: Arthur Ashe

quote: Action may not always bring happiness; but there is no happiness without action.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: The great thing in the world is not so much to seek happiness as to earn peace and self-respect.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: To have the sense of creative activity is the great happiness and the great proof of being alive.
name: Matthew Arnold

quote: Happiness is having a scratch for every itch.
name: Ogden Nash

quote: Life's greatest happiness is to be convinced we are loved.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Like anything worth doing in life, happiness takes time and patience and consistency.
name: Mark Manson

quote: Don't wait around for other people to be happy for you. Any happiness you get you've got to make yourself.
name: Alice Walker

quote: I know the joy of fishes in the river through my own joy, as I go walking along the same river.
name: Zhuangzi

quote: Man needs, for his happiness, not only the enjoyment of this or that, but hope and enterprise and change.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: One of the standards on which your happiness is based, now and in your future, is moral purity.
name: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: There is no such thing as the pursuit of happiness, but there is the discovery of joy.
name: Joyce Grenfell

quote: Happiness is not a matter of events; it depends upon the tides of the mind.
name: Alice Meynell

quote: Money can't buy you happiness, but it helps you look for it in a lot more places.
name: Milton Berle

quote: To be perfectly happy it does not suffice to possess happiness, it is necessary to have deserved it.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Happiness is brief. It will not stay. God batters at its sails.
name: Euripides

quote: Happiness is the absence of the striving for happiness.
name: Zhuangzi

quote: No one goes straight to happiness after a breakup.
name: Estelle

quote: There is only one real happiness in life, and that is the happiness of creating.
name: Frederick Delius

quote: The search for happiness is one of the chief sources of unhappiness.
name: Eric Hoffer

quote: Doing nothing is happiness for children and misery for old men.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Religion will prove to the believer a comforter and a sure guide to the fountain of true happiness.
name: Ellen G. White

quote: Most people ask for happiness on condition. Happiness can only be felt if you don't set any condition.
name: Arthur Rubinstein

quote: Being rich and famous isn't all happiness and at times the pressures have got to me.
name: Frida Lyngstad

quote: Happiness: an agreeable sensation arising from contemplating the misery of another.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Happiness is ideal, it is the work of the imagination.
name: Marquis de Sade

quote: Unfortunately but absolutely fair to all, the one thing money can't buy is health - and happiness.
name: Yolanda Hadid

quote: Happiness isn't something you experience; it's something you remember.
name: Oscar Levant

quote: Happiness will come from materialism, not from meaning.
name: Andrei Platonov

quote: Happiness is composed of misfortunes avoided.
name: Alphonse Karr

quote: Happiness lies first of all in health.
name: George William Curtis

quote: To me, flowers are happiness.
name: Stefano Gabbana

quote: But O, how bitter a thing it is to look into happiness through another man's eyes.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: No matter how dull, or how mean, or how wise a man is, he feels that happiness is his indisputable right.
name: Helen Keller

quote: Friendship improves happiness and abates misery, by the doubling of our joy and the dividing of our grief.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: The smallest seed of faith is better than the largest fruit of happiness.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Happiness is not being pained in body or troubled in mind.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Anyone who starts piercing the bubble of happiness, get 'em out of your life.
name: Robert Kraft

quote: The first requisite for the happiness of the people is the abolition of religion.
name: Karl Marx

quote: Research has shown that the best way to be happy is to make each day happy.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: Our daily decisions and habits have a huge impact upon both our levels of happiness and success.
name: Shawn Achor

quote: Love is trembling happiness.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Happiness is a choice that requires effort at times.
name: Aeschylus

quote: Happiness is overrated. There has to be conflict in life.
name: Brad Pitt

quote: Happiness is the reward we get for living to the highest right we know.
name: Richard Bach

quote: Happiness is a direction, not a place.
name: Sydney J. Harris

quote: Happiness is found in doing, not merely possessing.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: You know it's love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you're not part of their happiness.
name: Julia Roberts

quote: We have no more right to consume happiness without producing it than to consume wealth without producing it.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Of all forms of caution, caution in love is perhaps the most fatal to true happiness.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: The greatest of follies is to sacrifice health for any other kind of happiness.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Did perpetual happiness in the Garden of Eden maybe get so boring that eating the apple was justified?
name: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: It is not God's will merely that we should be happy, but that we should make ourselves happy.
name: Immanuel Kant

quote: I am a kind of paranoid in reverse. I suspect people of plotting to make me happy.
name: J. D. Salinger

quote: Happiness in marriage is entirely a matter of chance.
name: Jane Austen

quote: No man is happy without a delusion of some kind. Delusions are as necessary to our happiness as realities.
name: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: I've always been able to transform happiness and pain and sorrow and tears into positive energy.
name: Thalia

quote: Your successes and happiness are forgiven you only if you generously consent to share them.
name: Albert Camus

quote: There is nothing that you can't overcome. So it's never too late for happiness.
name: Pepa

quote: A sure way to lose happiness, I found, is to want it at the expense of everything else.
name: Bette Davis

quote: You can be happy where you are.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: And one who is just of his own free will shall not lack for happiness; and he will never come to utter ruin.
name: Aeschylus

quote: Happiness is making your dreams come true.
name: Jourdan Dunn

quote: I always was a rich person because money's not related to happiness.
name: Paulo Coelho

quote: Whenever you choose power over love, you will never find true happiness.
name: Karen Salmansohn

quote: Happiness is a how; not a what. A talent, not an object.
name: Hermann Hesse

quote: There is no excellence without labor. One cannot dream oneself into either usefulness or happiness.
name: Liberty Hyde Bailey

quote: Happiness is always a coincidence.
name: Jose Bergamin

quote: The person who seeks all their applause from outside has their happiness in another's keeping .
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: Anything you're good at contributes to happiness.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: Where fear is, happiness is not.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Happiness is a ball after which we run wherever it rolls, and we push it with our feet when it stops.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Money can't buy happiness.
name: Howard Hughes

quote: Holiness, not happiness, is the chief end of man.
name: Oswald Chambers

quote: A good cook is like a sorceress who dispenses happiness.
name: Elsa Schiaparelli

quote: My aim in life isn't so much the pursuit of happiness as the happiness of pursuit.
name: Charles Saatchi

quote: There is only one passion, the passion for happiness.
name: Denis Diderot

quote: Happiness is neither without us nor within us. It is in God, both without us and within us.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: Happiness is a continuation of happenings which are not resisted.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: My University of Management will create managers who will float in happiness, success and fulfillment.
name: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: Make space in your life, space for health and happiness.
name: Kris Carr

quote: One mustn't ask apple trees for oranges, France for sun, women for love, life for happiness.
name: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Happiness is not a reward - it is a consequence. Suffering is not a punishment - it is a result.
name: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: My happiness doesn't come from money or fame. My happiness comes from seeing life without struggle.
name: Nicki Minaj

quote: 'Happiness' is a pointless goal.
name: Jordan Peterson

quote: I relate to happiness as an ecstatic moment - something you don't create, you encounter.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: Happiness is secured through virtue; it is a good attained by man's own will.
name: Thomas Aquinas

quote: There is something curiously boring about somebody else's happiness.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: Real happiness comes from discovering a sense of importance in one's actions and in one's life.
name: Mark Manson

quote: Genuine happiness comes from within, and often it comes in spontaneous feelings of joy.
name: Andrew Weil

quote: Happiness is often at its most intense when it is based on inequality.
name: James Salter

quote: Happiness has a bad rap. People say it shouldn't be your goal in life. Oh, yes it should.
name: Richard Dreyfuss

quote: It is not easy to find happiness in ourselves, and it is not possible to find it elsewhere.
name: Agnes Repplier

quote: I have this really high priority on happiness and finding something to be happy about.
name: Taylor Swift

quote: Life should be blissful, and blissful doesn't mean just a small happiness. It's huge. It is profound.
name: David Lynch

quote: I think happiness is a goal all of us can agree on. Let's face it - we all would like to be happy.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: Happiness is the cessation of suffering.
name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Money can't buy you happiness but it does bring you a more pleasant form of misery.
name: Spike Milligan

quote: No human being can really understand another, and no one can arrange another's happiness.
name: Graham Greene

quote: All happiness or unhappiness solely depends upon the quality of the object to which we are attached by love.
name: Baruch Spinoza

quote: Happiness is mostly a by-product of doing what makes us feel fulfilled.
name: Benjamin Spock

quote: Thus happiness depends, as nature shows, less on exterior things than most suppose.
name: William Cowper

quote: Just staying healthy, that is true wealth and true happiness.
name: Jon Jones

quote: Action may not bring happiness but there is no happiness without action.
name: William James

quote: If you hope for happiness in the world, hope for it from God, and not from the world.
name: David Brainerd

quote: The secret of happiness is: Find something more important than you are and dedicate your life to it.
name: Daniel Dennett

quote: Martial arts is what pulled me through tough times, and it is one of the reasons for my happiness.
name: Tiger Shroff

quote: For me, the only sources of moral values are the pursuit of understanding and the pursuit of happiness.
name: Matthew Stewart

quote: The happiness of this life depends less on what befalls you than the way in which you take it.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: To forget oneself is to be happy.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Wisdom is the supreme part of happiness.
name: Sophocles

quote: Everyone chases after happiness, not noticing that happiness is right at their heels.
name: Bertolt Brecht

quote: It's the most beautiful job in the world to give happiness to people.
name: Hubert de Givenchy

quote: Life is to be fortified by many friendships. To love and to be loved is the greatest happiness of existence.
name: Sydney Smith

quote: It is the chief joy of all holy beings to witness the joy and happiness of those around them.
name: Ellen G. White

quote: Happiness is itself a kind of gratitude.
name: Joseph Wood Krutch

quote: When you relinquish the desire to control your future, you can have more happiness.
name: Nicole Kidman

quote: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open.
name: John Barrymore

quote: I envy the happiness of others... I envy the sense of belonging... I seem always to be remaking myself.
name: Richard Eyre

quote: There's no greater source of happiness than giving yourself to other people.
name: Lamman Rucker

quote: Traveling is the ruin of all happiness! There's no looking at a building after seeing Italy.
name: Frances Burney

quote: I am deeply grateful for the concern of all those who constantly prayed for my happiness.
name: Princess Margaret

quote: Happiness grows at our own firesides, and is not to be picked in strangers' gardens.
name: Douglas William Jerrold

quote: Five or six hundred heads cut off would have assured your repose, freedom and happiness.
name: Jean-Paul Marat

quote: It is for others one must learn to do everything; for there lies the secret of happiness.
name: Jules Verne

quote: What's the use of happiness? It can't buy you money.
name: Henny Youngman

quote: A good way I know to find happiness, is to not bore a hole to fit the plug.
name: Josh Billings

quote: Our happiness depends on wisdom all the way.
name: Sophocles

quote: Happiness isn't getting what you want, it's wanting what you got.
name: Garth Brooks

quote: Character is the basis of happiness and happiness the sanction of character.
name: George Santayana

quote: If I have to apply five turns to the screw each day for the happiness of Argentina, I will do it.
name: Evita Peron

quote: To describe happiness is to diminish it.
name: Stendhal

quote: True religion... is giving and finding one's happiness by bringing happiness into the lives of others.
name: William J. H. Boetcker

quote: Happiness is a hard master, particularly other people's happiness.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: Whether happiness may come or not, one should try and prepare one's self to do without it.
name: George Eliot

quote: What better is there to sigh for than happiness, yesterday's or tomorrow's.
name: Ben Hecht

quote: There is no happiness in having or in getting, but only in giving.
name: Henry Drummond

quote: Happiness is working with Jack Lemmon.
name: Billy Wilder

quote: My ultimate joy and happiness is being a wife and mother.
name: Melissa Etheridge

quote: The discovery of a new dish confers more happiness on humanity, than the discovery of a new star.
name: Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quote: It is the true duty of every man to promote the happiness of his fellow creatures to the utmost of his power.
name: William Wilberforce

quote: Life is about making your own happiness - and living by your own rules.
name: Aimee Mullins

quote: Happiness serves hardly any other purpose than to make unhappiness possible.
name: Marcel Proust

quote: There is even a happiness - that makes the heart afraid.
name: Thomas Hood

quote: Know then this truth, enough for man to know virtue alone is happiness below.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: It is the chiefest point of happiness that a man is willing to be what he is.
name: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: There's a higher form of happiness in commitment. I'm counting on it.
name: Claire Forlani

quote: Happiness does not consist in self-love.
name: Joseph Butler

quote: I say there is not more happiness for me than the freedom of my Homeland.
name: Islom Karimov

quote: The secret of happiness is something to do.
name: John Burroughs

quote: I have discovered the secret of happiness. It is work.
name: John Burroughs

quote: Happiness depends more on how life strikes you than on what happens.
name: Andy Rooney

quote: Happiness is a simple everyday miracle, like water, and we are not aware of it.
name: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: When a man has lost all happiness, he's not alive. Call him a breathing corpse.
name: Sophocles

quote: Happy he who learns to bear what he cannot change.
name: Friedrich Schiller

quote: There is something in the pang of change More than the heart can bear, Unhappiness remembering happiness.
name: Euripides

quote: Do not speak of your happiness to one less fortunate than yourself.
name: Plutarch

quote: Happiness is a mystery, like religion, and should never be rationalised.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Happiness is a virtue, not its reward.
name: Baruch Spinoza

quote: So long as we can lose any happiness, we possess some.
name: Booth Tarkington

quote: When you look at the books about well-being, you see one word - it's happiness. People do not distinguish.
name: Daniel Kahneman

quote: Power, after love, is the first source of happiness.
name: Stendhal

quote: The universe is conspiring in every moment to bring me happiness and peace.
name: Marianne Williamson

quote: Joys divided are increased.
name: Josiah Gilbert Holland

quote: There is no happiness outside of ourselves.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: I don't have the recipe for happiness, but I think the engine is simply having the desire.
name: Vanessa Paradis

quote: Every age has its happiness and troubles.
name: Jeanne Calment

quote: People will survive, and they will find happiness. Happiness only comes when you're not looking for it.
name: Hugh Laurie

quote: Happiness isn't a fortune in a cookie. It's deeper, wider, funnier, and more transporting than that.
name: Elvis Costello

quote: Happiness is being on the beam with life - to feel the pull of life.
name: Agnes Martin

quote: One must realise his Self in order to open the store of unalloyed happiness.
name: Ramana Maharshi

quote: The secret of happiness is to admire without desiring. And that is not happiness.
name: F. H. Bradley

quote: I believe happiness is a choice. Some days it is a very difficult choice.
name: Steve Gleason

quote: Heaven takes care that no man secures happiness by crime.
name: Vittorio Alfieri

quote: The happiness of the creature consists in rejoicing in God, by which also God is magnified and exalted.
name: Jonathan Edwards

quote: Happiness is a by-product. You cannot pursue it by itself.
name: Sam Levenson

quote: Always leave something to wish for; otherwise you will be miserable from your very happiness.
name: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Nothing prevents happiness like the memory of happiness.
name: Andre Gide

quote: You will find peace and happiness if you will live the gospel.
name: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Growth itself contains the germ of happiness.
name: Pearl S. Buck

quote: Dancing and running shake up the chemistry of happiness.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: But my happiness in this world - my level of peace - is never going to be dictated by acting.
name: Chris Evans

quote: Only man clogs his happiness with care, destroying what is with thoughts of what may be.
name: John Dryden

quote: God's children and their happiness are my reasons for being.
name: Red Skelton

quote: One of the keys to happiness is a bad memory.
name: Rita Mae Brown

quote: Years of happiness can be lost in the foolish gratification of a momentary desire for pleasure.
name: Ezra Taft Benson

quote: Money can't buy happiness, but it can make you awfully comfortable while you're being miserable.
name: Clare Boothe Luce

quote: I think we pursue positive relationships whether or not they bring us engagement or happiness.
name: Martin Seligman

quote: What humans want is not just happiness. They want justice; they want meaning.
name: Martin Seligman

quote: Bookstore operators tell us that the books which head the bestseller list are books on peace and happiness.
name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: A wise woman never yields by appointment. It should always be an unforeseen happiness.
name: Stendhal

quote: How easy to be amiable in the midst of happiness and success.
name: William Ellery Channing

quote: The happiness and misery of men depend no less on temper than fortune.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Heartache is very fertile ground for song-making but so is happiness, so is absolute bliss.
name: K. D. Lang

quote: If you have easy self-contentment, you might have a very, very cheap source of happiness.
name: Leon Kass

quote: The arrival of any child brings you a lot of happiness.
name: Seal

quote: Desire is individual. Happiness is common.
name: Julian Casablancas

quote: Our nation was founded on the principals of life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness.
name: Leonard Boswell

quote: Happiness needs one-upmanship.
name: Zygmunt Bauman

quote: Life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness is part of our constitutional rights and it belongs to everybody.
name: Jeffrey Tambor

quote: If we did not look to marriage as the principal source of happiness, fewer marriages would end in tears.
name: Anthony Storr

quote: There is no worse sorrow than remembering happiness in the day of sorrow.
name: Alfred de Musset

quote: Nothing is harder to dramatize than happiness.
name: Julian Fellowes

quote: If you can measure success in this business based on happiness alone I feel like I've hit the lottery.
name: Justin Long

quote: Well, the attractive thing about the subject of happiness is that it is notoriously difficult to write.
name: Edward St Aubyn

quote: Eternal principles that govern happiness apply equally to all.
name: Russell M. Nelson

quote: There is happiness in duty, although it may not seem so.
name: Jose Marti

quote: Happiness seems made to be shared.
name: Pierre Corneille

quote: It's pretty hard to tell what does bring happiness; poverty and wealth have both failed.
name: Kin Hubbard

quote: To buy happiness is to sell soul.
name: Douglas Horton

quote: The world is full of people looking for spectacular happiness while they snub contentment.
name: Doug Larson

quote: When what we are is what we want to be, that's happiness.
name: Malcolm Forbes

quote: Happiness is the interval between periods of unhappiness.
name: Don Marquis

quote: Happiness comes only when we push our brains and hearts to the farthest reaches of which we are capable.
name: Leo Rosten

quote: Happiness is the longing for repetition.
name: Milan Kundera

quote: We possess only the happiness we are able to understand.
name: Maurice Maeterlinck

quote: It is only to the happy that tears are a luxury.
name: Thomas Moore

quote: The secret to life is finding joy in ordinary things. I'm interested in happiness.
name: Ruth Reichl

quote: We are no longer happy so soon as we wish to be happier.
name: Walter Savage Landor

quote: The happiness which is lacking makes one think even the happiness one has unbearable.
name: Joseph Roux

quote: An effort made for the happiness of others lifts above ourselves.
name: Lydia M. Child

quote: The right to happiness is fundamental.
name: Anna Pavlova

quote: People let their own hang-ups become the obstacles between them and personal happiness.
name: Lucinda Williams

quote: Happiness is no laughing matter.
name: Richard Whately

quote: The action is best that secures the greatest happiness for the greatest number.
name: William Dean Howells

quote: Life everlasting in a state of happiness is the greatest desire of all men.
name: Joseph Franklin Rutherford

quote: Most of us believe in trying to make other people happy only if they can be happy in ways which we approve.
name: Robert Staughton Lynd
